summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Pullman Avenue, from Ann Arbor Avenue to East 60th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 163951 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
